articles.author: Maureen Lee Lenker
articles.title: Lashana Lynch on discovering that Matilda's Miss Honey is a queer icon - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: "I thought, 'Oh my gosh, this is a revelation to me,'" says Lynch of her sweet schoolteacher character. "I never knew, but I'm glad."
articles.content:
For many LGBTQ fans of Matilda, the kindly Miss Honey signaled a queer awakening.
